resources.string: Shree Ganeshaya. Namah sheshashayi lakshminarayana. Aadimoorti omkaara suguna. Tuja dhyato kailaasincha raana. Suravara vanditi charana.||1|| Bhaktakajalaagi punya keerti. Sange ghevuniya aadishakti. Pragatali chaturbhuja murti. Shanka chakra gada padma haati.||2|| Ratnamaya mukuta kundale. Haasyamukha sundar shobhale pitambar paridhan kele. Koti surya teja prakashale.||3| Bhaali divya kasturicha tiLa. Gala roole vaijayanti maala. Srivastaachi khoona vakshasthala. Angaranga ruchira saavaLa.||4|| Laviyale mana tujya dhaani. Drushya pancha vishayaancha raani. Naagavile kaamadi choraani maariti hai dhaav chakrapaani. ||5|| Dhavunity gaja uddharisi. Droupadila sankati paavsi. Ajamila paataki taarisi. Majachi kaa devi mokalisi.||6|| Arpiyale tan man dhan. Daavi maja ekada charana. Tujaveen jhaalo bahu deen. Kari deva maajhi aathvana.||7|| Nijabhakta kaam kalpadruma. Aisi thori varniti nigama. Bhavabhaya vaari tujhe naam. Krishna mhane mukhya hechi varma.||8||

Sadashiva deva rameshwara. Vishwajanasi tuja aadhara. Namanantre paap parihaara. Neelakantha tu rameshwara.||1|| Aganita lingaamaji uttama. Jagi prasidda rameshwar naam. Bhakt janaasi tu vishram. Divya swaroop tu parabrahma.||2|| Trinetra tu karpoor goura. Trishool damaru tu digambara. Vibhuti sakkhya kanthi hara. Neelakantha tu rameshwara.||3|| Bhaali chandra tu umechya vallabha. Bhaali tripudra laayaka shobha. Jata mukuta gangesi shoba. Bairavi vetaala sanmukha ubha.||4|| Jyachya charanashi karani kalena. Kaallakantaka daitya nivaari. Madana jaaluni keli holi. Poorna samudra tu chandramouli.||5|| Somavaari tujhi puja mahima thori. Puja bandhiti nanapari. Bhaktajana yeti tujhe mandiri. Puraana keertana hota hai bhaari.||6|| Devadhideva paar na kaaLe tujha. Konata saankuL dev maajha. Chaturmukhi brahmna bole vaacha. Dhanya divas aaj soniyaacha.||7|| Vedapuraani na kaLe anta. Ramnath dev mahima samartha. Prasanna jhalya riddhisiddhi vade. Tujha mahima akhanda samartha.||8||

Shree Ganeshaya namaha jagadambe shantayi bhavani. Tujhe moolsthana rishivani. Vipralagi prasanna houni. Aali lotavalisa kalyani.||1|| Ramanathapurvi nimba lona. Tuja aarti shadrasa pakvann. Mahajan deti bahu man. Bhave samarpiti nrutya gaan.||2|| Paalkheene pratipanchamisa tujhi svaari nighe saavkaash. Varvadhu varniti vilaas. Bhaktajanamaanasi ullasa.||3|| Aadhi tujhe swarup sundar. Nesalisa jari peetambar. Vari jaditaache alankaar. Tene dise dhyaan manohar.||4|| Trasvile vipra daanvaani. Aali tyancha sankati dhaavoni. Parakrame dushta ragadoni sukhi kele dvija varadaani.||5|| Kaam krodh lobh dusht bhaari traas deti maja nana pari. Yaansi nirdaluni mala tari. Bhavabhaya samoola tiwaari. ||6|| Ati amoulika narkaya. Upayogi saadhana karaya. Janam mrutyu bhaya chakavaya. Jhadakari daavi aatmathaya.||7|| Tujha aadhare aatamaaram. Thaayi pade hrudayi visharam. Kalpanecha karuni viraam. Krishna daavi nijasukhadaam.||8||

Aadinaatha jagannatha praananaatha puratana 
Sarva kaaryasiddhidaata siddhinaatha namostute 
Nitya rakshi bhakta jana. 
Aparaadha kshamaapana. 
Dasa aale aaple mhanoona. 
Karije dosha naashana.

Shree ganeshaaya namaha. Jaya kamakshe mangalmoorte. Kaaura deshavaasini tu maate. Raaya graami prasanna samarthe. Aali lotavali krupavanta.||1|| Saata sahasra gana tujha sangi. Kaalabhairava ubha agrabhaagi. Auta koti bhoote tujalaagi bhaktarakshanasaathi upayogi.||2|| Tuva mahishaasura nirdaloni. Chanda mundadaitya vidhvansoni. Shumbanishumbaasi ragadoni. Deva sodavile trasantuni.||3|| Ramnath sthala hai pavitra. Aavadine kele krupa paatra. Bhakta upaasiti ahoratra. Tuja bahumaanito trinetra.||4|| Navaratri ashwinamaasanta. Bhakta jana yeti ashankhyaata. Basaviti tujha makharaanta. Dvadasheesa bhaara kaula deta.||5|| Prati aamavasye paalakheenta. Tujhi svaari nighe miravata. Pudhe vaadhaghosha. Nrutyageeta. Samaagame mahaajana jaata.||6|| Vadya dvaadasheesa maaghamaasi. Aarambhiti jaatra aanandesi. Puraana keertan naatakaasi. Shivaratri utsavi vaisasi.||7|| Bhaktimukti daasaanlaagi dhyaya. Paapi dushta durjana dandaya. Avataralo tu aadi maaya. Olakhuni krishna dhari paaya.||8||

Shree ganeshaaya namaha. Jaya vetaala khanderaya. Bhaktajana sankata haraaya. Khadga daala haati dharoniya siddh tujhi vishaala kaaya.||1|| Kshetradhipati tu kshetra paala. Tujhe naama aagiya vetala. Bhoot preta pishachyancha mela. Tavaghene varte sarvakaala.||2|| Saasashtimadhye lotavali graam tethe aagara khanuni kele naam. Tuja bhakta rakshanaache kaam. Aise guna varniti uttama.||3|| Kurdi shotodiche thor vasti. Bhoushulecha baandhaachi prakhyaati. Aikouniya lok vaakhaaniti. Sarvaanthaayi gaaje tuji keerti.||4|| Ramnath-shaanta-padi thevuniya tishtasi samaksha. tyaanchi aagna paalavaya daksha. Tuja priya maani virupaaksha.||5|| Ashwinamaasi dasara thor. Trupta housi karuni aahara. Prakatasi tarangi avasar. Bhetavaya yeti naari nara.||6||Bhoot pret pida parihaar. Karitase tujha avasar. Paahtaati jana saakshatkaar. Vaanti sevakaasi dravyabhaar.||7|| Sarvandesi kaula pushpamaala. Purvajaansi dila shabda paala. Kari sarva bhaktancha sambhaala. Krishna tuja vaani sarvakaala.||8||

Shree ganeshaaya namaha. Devarajyasevyamanapaavanaadhnipankajam. vyaalayajna sutramindushekharam krupakaram. Naradadiyogivrundavanditam digambaram kashikapuradhinaatha kalabhairavam bhaje.||1|| Bhaanukotibhaavasvaram bhaavabdhitaarakam param neelakanthamipsitarthadayakam trilochanam. Kaalakaalamamvujaakshamashoolamaksharam kashika.||2|| Shoolatankapaashadandapaanimaadikaaranam shyamakam madidevamaksharam niramayam. Bhim vikramam prabhu vichitrataandavapriyam kashika.||3|| Bhuktimuktidaayakam Prashastacharuvigraham bhaktavatsalam sthitam samasthalokavigraham. Vinikvananmanognahemaakinkinilasatkatim kashika.||4|| Dharmasetupaalakam svadharmamaarganaashakam karmapaashamochakam Susharmadaayakam vibhum svarvavarnasheshapaashashobhitaangamandalam kashika.||5|| Ratnapaaduka prabhabhiramapaadayugmakam nitvamapadayugmakam nityamaadvitiyamishtadaivatam niranjanam. Mrutvachadarpanaashanam karaaladamshtramokshanam kashika.||6|| Attahaasabhinna pahmajaandakoshasantati drishtipaatanashtapaapjaatamugra-shaasanam. Ashtasiddhidaayakam kapaalamaalikandharam kaashika||7|| Bhootasanghanaayakam vishaalakirtidaayaka kaashivaasalokapunyapaapashodhakam vibhum. Nitimaargakobidam puratana jagatpatim kashika.||8|| Kalabhairavaashtakam pathanti ye manoharam gnanamuktisadhanam vichitrapunyavarthanam shokamohadainvalobhakopataapanaashanam prayanti kalabhairavaadhnisannidhi nara dhruvam. ||9|| Iti shrimacchankarachaaryavirachitam kalabhairavashtakam sammpurnam.

Laksmiryasya parigraha kamalabhoo sunugarutaman rathaha pautrashrachandravibhushanaha suraguruhu sheshashracha shayyashana|| Brahmandam varamandiram suragana yasyaprabhoho sevakaha sa trailokya kutumbapaalanaparaha kurvantu vo managalam|| \n Brahma vaayugirisha sheshagaruda devendrakaamou guruhu chandrakau varunaanalau manuyamau vittesha vighneshravarau||
